name: travel-planner-web
description: 轻量旅行规划网页版应用

scripts.dev: cd web-app && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.serve: cd web-app && npm install && npm run serve
scripts.start: cd web-app && npm install && npm run start
scripts.build: cd web-app && npm install && npm run build
scripts.preview: cd web-app && npm install && npm run preview

author: 轻量旅行规划团队
